function.name: command_control_tool
function.description: Send commands to devices to control their behavior (set, change, turn on, turn off)

tool.description: The tool name indicating the type of operation to perform

device.description: The Device ID (id) for the device in DEVICE STRUCTURE.

command.description: The Command ID (id) for the Accept Command for the device in DEVICE STRUCTURE.

id.description: The unique identifier (id) for the parameter from for the command from DEVICE STRUCTURE. If none, use n/a

value.description: Always a number. See **GLOBAL CUSTOMER VALUE CONVERSION RULES**.

uom.description: The uom_id for the parameter from DEVICE STRUCTURE. See **GLOBAL UOM RULES**

precision.description: The precision for the parameter value.

parameters.description: List of parameters for the command.
